column2: x-terminal-emulator -T 'Inxi Info' -e bash -c "inxi -Fxrzm; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Qemu Installer' -e bash -c "qemu-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"

x-terminal-emulator -T 'Liquorix Kernel Installer' -e bash -c "liquorix-kernel-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Live-build Apps Installer' -e bash -c "live-build-apps-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Kernel Packages Installer' -e bash -c "kernel-apps-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
